ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'My Lord, help me because of their calling me a liar!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O my Lord," prayed (Noah), "help me against them, for they accuse me of lies."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Noah said: "My Lord! Come to my help at their accusation that I am lying."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Noah prayed, "Lord, help me; they have called me a liar".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Submitted Nooh, “My Lord! Help me as they deny me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "O my Lord! Help me because they deny me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: O my Lord! help me against their calling me a liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'O my Lord, help me, for that they cry me lies.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: My Lord! Help me because they deny me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Noah said, "My Lord, help me! for they have rejected me,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Nuh said: my Lord! vindicate me, for they belie me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘My Lord! Help me, for they impugn me.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Noah) said: "O my Lord! help me: for that they accuse me of falsehood!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Nuh (Noah)] said: "O my Lord! Help me because they deny me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He (Noah) said: 'Lord, help me, for they belie me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “My Lord, help me, for they have rejected me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Noah] said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:26] He, Noah, said, ‘My Lord, help me, against them, because they deny me’, because of their denial of me, by destroying them. God, exalted be He, says, responding to his supplication:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Noah said: (My Lord!) my Lord! (Help me) through sending a punishment upon them (because they deny me) because of their denial of the message.
